mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( board_title, board_content, board_writer, board_date ) VALUES( #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardWriter}, CURDATE() )
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET board_title=#{boardTitle}, board_content=#{boardContent}, board_date=#{boardDate}, board_writer=#{boardWriter} WHERE board_no=#{boardNo}
mapper.select: SELECT board_no as boardNo, board_title as boardTitle, board_content as boardContent, board_writer as boardWriter, board_date as boardDate FROM board ORDER BY board_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage};
SELECT comment_no as commentNo, comment_content as commentContent, comment_writer as commentWriter, board_no as boardNo FROM comment WHERE board_no=#{boardNo};
